text: 2.7 1 Jo 2.18, 4.3 Pen mɨñɨl ñɨn awl, bɨ God takaw tɨbɨlɨkep apɨl gɨnɨgab ak, bɨ ogɨnap kɨli kɨmɨgel we gɨl, bɨ anɨb anop kɨdek gebal. Bɨ olap pen, kanɨb pɨl gɨl mɨdaknɨŋ, bɨ God takaw tɨbɨlɨkep ak binɨb ne okok ap kɨd ne okok dad amnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Pen bɨ kanɨb pɨl gɨl mɨdeb anɨb ak nop dad ke okok amek,
